title: Sandra99
author: Sandra99
content: I am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?

comments.author: Mr. Magkaisa
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 10, 2023, 06:51:11 AMI am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?  -   Well, regarding my review here on bitget it started in 2018 and was based in Singapore as well. Then its value started at 0.0058$ and now its value is around 0.26$ something and BGB is its ticker name.As for what you are asking if you can use the copy trading formula? it depends on you mate, if you believe in copying your trader, just go. But if you have doubts about the trader you are going to copy, don't do it, and vice versa, it's that simple.For me, it's different from crypto trading where you do the trading yourself, because then it seems like you don't learn crypto trading and you don't improve, the organic way of trading is still much better compare to copy trading as for my opinion.

comments.author: posi
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 10, 2023, 06:51:11 AMI am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?You can try, as a newbie, I think you can try any method, any method that you feel can be profitable for you. But I need to tell you, it is not good to rely on others in the long run, no one can be better than yourself. And one more thing: as a newbie, it's not easy to make a profit in this market, so what you need to do is to limit your loss, so just use a small amount to get used to everything. Newbies need to experience it all to get what they need in the long run.

comments.author: Jascrypt
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 10, 2023, 06:51:11 AMI am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?I don't know if my response is coming rather late or could be still useful atm. comments.author: husencoe
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 10, 2023, 06:51:11 AMI am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?Maybe on your side, trying copy trading is a good first step in learning.  But don't just stick on them forever, because they will keep making you dependent on them and won't make you grow.  I suggest you try learning trading with your own hands.  You can use a demo account to learn, so you can try various analysis methods without losing.  For starters, just use a small amount for work and just focus on honing your analytical skills, training your emotions and don't be greedy. Look for references that you can find from YouTube or websites and try to practice it yourself. To be a good trader, you must have commitment and do it independently.

comments.author: Bureau
comments.body: Beware! Trading is risky and as trader first understand the charts. Following anyone blindly will not help you in your earnings. If you can study charts you will know whether to follow a trade can be fruitful or not. I am posting a link for you to learn the basics of charts. You can go through it if you want and then try your hand with copy trade. Introduction to charts and patterns.

comments.author: EarnOnVictor
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 10, 2023, 06:51:11 AMI am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?Since you are a new trader, my first advice for you is to learn about the market, and with this, you get to know what to do better even if you do not know how to trade so well. Expertise about trading will take time, and the less you force it, the better for you, just let it flow easily even as you are serious about it. Also, I would like you to continue trying automated systems like copy trading and all that alongside it, and before you know it, you get to know the best ones to choose even as you get better at trading. You may want to look beyond their percentage performance as well, it could be deceptive, you need the time they've survived the market, their maximum drawdown, the risk level and much more before you can be certain of their earning performance and the safety of your account.Many of them would do well for a while but make you lose the whole money in your account later, so the management part is so important and this can only be known if you study the strategy for a long period. But I have not seen anyone who says they are successful with the copying trade system of crypto exchange in the long run.

comments.author: mk4
comments.body: Copy trading is generally frowned upon because 99% of people can't trade for shit so you're likely to lose money in the long term and is better off just holding good 'ol BTC or ETH.But if you really want to try it out and find out the results yourself, then go for it.

comments.author: sunsilk
comments.body: It seems that through copy trading, many show to the public that it's like an conventional way of trading because it's effortless. I don't know about bitget if there's a commission from the person you copy but it's not giving me confidence that someone I'll just copy his trades and I'll make money.IMO, if this is the thing nowadays then many have became rich through copy trading but because of how's the reality about it, you'd see that many still struggles with trading. This is the reason if you want to learn trading, learn and do it on your own. Otherwise, just accumulate, DCA and hold.

comments.author: Reatim
comments.body: I think as beginners, people can learn from copying others. We often look at more experienced traders in order to just get a hold of how trading works.In due time, I think you will be able to make decisions for yourself.I think this can also serve as a lesson in case you make mistakes. Of course we don’t wish that upon you but just in case you do then that is the moment where you can add it to the things you learned from and would most likely avoid doing again

comments.author: 2Pizza410000BTC

But from this formula you will later adopt the trading strategy by yourself when you understand the signals yourself and start trading from that day you will do well. But always remember never be too greedy in trading platform and when you are too greedy then definitely you will not succeed in trading platform and even if you lose patience you will not be successful in trading platform. comments.author: God bless u
comments.body: Never I will not recommend you with that because it'll stop the learning process of your crypto journey. The process to learn is very important in this field because eventually it'll lead you to more good trades and very impressive profits. But if you'll just rely on someone for your trade he might give you some good profits but then you'll completely rely on them and their portfolio will be like yours there is no chance of something different happening from your side of mind. You'll eventually enjoy trading in crypto once you learn along with the earning option and then you can teach others as well and save them from making bigger mistakes.

comments.body: I have been hearing this centralized exchanges platform for years but I have not used it so no too much knowledge about it but since it is and exchange I believed you can used it to do the copy trade. comments.author: Ben Barubal

comments.author: Kelvinid
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 10, 2023, 06:51:11 AMI am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?Perhaps you can try and see what is the results and also can say how this copy trading works. But as some members are saying, don't expect a lot from copy trading. Yes, there is no right formula in trading because of the volatile nature of the market which is why this copy trading style never works effectively. For learning purposes and exploring, that can be beneficial but in terms of profit earning, that is doubtful. Because there is one way that we are able to achieve success in trading and that is to rely upon ourselves, not others. In fact, old traders didn't use this strategy because they already found out that it was not a working style in trading.

comments.author: Sophokles
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 10, 2023, 06:51:11 AMI am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?Copy trading features are for people like you who don't have the time or skill to sit on a desk and observe the market to trade. Use copy trading if you think you are good with risking your money in another persons hands. Any kind of profit or loss that person will take from his trading activity directly affects your account. So its your money but someone else will be responsible for your profit and loss. If you copy an experienced trader who has a good trade record, then i don't think there is much to fear.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: Quote from: Sandra99 on February 10, 2023, 06:51:11 AMI am Not experince Trader Can i use any copy trading Formula ?Copy trading are mainly for traders that don't have enough time to sit and analyze the market. We should be extremely careful in the space, never to look down on the big winnings because they have strong effects on our attitudes when it comes to the system. Been a newbie doesn't matter in the space, what matters is the ability to stack up gigantic profits on your end. Ofcourse you can use trading formula for your personal trades. It's advisable to stick to strong foundations in the space, never to look back but form strong grounds.

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Quote from: Bureau on March 12, 2024, 02:51:36 AMBeware! Trading is risky and as trader first understand the charts. Following anyone blindly will not help you in your earnings. If you can study charts you will know whether to follow a trade can be fruitful or not. I am posting a link for you to learn the basics of charts. You can go through it if you want and then try your hand with copy trade. Introduction to charts and patterns.This is one thing that most newbies fail to understand about copy trading: you can't just move into trading without even having any basic knowledge about how trading works and how to follow up charts, and yet you want to blindly follow someone else's trade, even if you feel like they are making the best out of it.  @Op copy trading is good sometimes, but most times it can lead you to losing all your funds that you enter the market with. The person you copy their trade with is a human like you and can make some bad trading decisions, and if you are unlucky, you might copy the bad trade, which is why you need experience and knowledge about trading so that you can detect a wrong move when you see one.
